thread.section_title: Alhambra Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Budget hotel
thread.title_full: Nice Budget hotel - Review of Alhambra Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: oconnort1962
title: Nice Budget hotel
text:
Stayed 2 night in room 22 across road from reception
Room small but clean beds ok
Nice smart toilet/shower room
Breakfast well cooked and presented
Only negative on both nights the tv sound switched on bang on midnight frightened the wits out of me not sure if it on timer but needs to be sorted
All in all good location and nice budget friendly hotel
